h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)
content: He can also employ this huge sweeping arc attack by other means, most notably when he tries to plunge his sword in the ground near you, he’ll rip it out while performing a huge spin attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)'.
The content is as follows:
He can also employ this huge sweeping arc attack by other means, most notably when he tries to plunge his sword in the ground near you, he’ll rip it out while performing a huge spin attack.
